info.title: Coinsbank Site API
info.description: Alphabetical list of common-used CoinsBank API methods. Key and signature is obligatory with each request

put.description: Set params - currency to pay, payee details, etc. Returns crypto address and amount to pay

200.description: Payment params has been set successfully

ttlfixed.description: Time to expire exchange rate. After that time, amount to pay could be changed

put.summary: Pay invoice with transfer from CoinsBank account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account UID. Should be owned by or available for current user

balance.description: Summarized user's balances by currency {currency => amount}

baseBalance.description: Summarized user's balanced in selected base currency

lot.description: Minimal amount to trade for pair

rates.description: Last prices for trade pairs {pair => rate}

smsCommission.description: Current fee for 2FA codes sent by SMS

freeze.description: Summarized amount of deposit freezes in base currency

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order, array. For example sort[type]=asc&sort[status]=desc

caption.description: Invoice caption/name, partial or full string

descr.description: Invoice description, partial or full string

email.description: Partial or full payee email address

phone.description: Partial or full payee phone number

receivecrypto.description: Receive crypto as payment or not

receivefiat.description: Receive fiat as payment or not

post.description: Invoice will be sent automatically with payment link to payee email or phone number

parameters.name: currencyWish
parameters.description: Currency to get after payment. Will be automatically converted if differs from invoice currency

parameters.name: commissionType
parameters.description: Include CoinsBank fee to invoice or not
enum: 0 - fee will be taken from merchant
1 - fee will be included to invoice

put.summary: Force invoice close, accept payment whenever paid partially or not

get.summary: Is current user has active merchant service or not
get.description: Merchant service should be activated before first invoice created

post.description: Activate merchant service and accept CoinsBank rules and conditions

get.description: Calculate fee for invoice processing. Fee could be included to invoice or taken from amount paid by invoice
Operation is a group of transactions. For example, a deposit, withdrawal or card payment, etc. Operations has statuses, transactions hasn't.

operationType.description: Operation type, integet or integers array

currency.description: Currency, string or array of strings

accountId.description: Account UID or array of UIDs

status.description: Operation status, integer of integers array

get.description: Get operations list by account UID

operationType.description: Operation type, integet or integers array

currency.description: Currency, string or array of strings

accountId.description: Account UID or array of UIDs

status.description: Operation status, integer of integers array

parameters.name: exchangeRate
parameters.description: Exchange rate for limit order. Market order if not set.

parameters.name: commissionType
enum: 0 - account take currency from. Ex., if during the trades user spends USD, fee will be taken in USD
1 - account get currency to. Ex., if during the trades user acquires BTC, fee will be taken in BTC

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order, array. For example sort[type]=asc&sort[status]=desc

triggeredBy.description: Triggered by order unique ID. For stop-loss/take-profit

currencyGet.description: Currency to get, string or array

currencyPay.description: Currency to pay, string or array

accountIdFrom.description: Account UID to pay, string or array

accountIdTo.description: Account UID to get, string or array

parameters.name: fromUserAccount
parameters.description: Account UID to pay currency from

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Order direction for fee calculations. If sell - by fromUserAccount, buy - toUserAccount

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Amnount to calculate fee by direction

parameters.name: exchangeRate
parameters.description: Exchange rate for limit order. If not set then market order

amount_min.description: Min amount for order by account balance excl. fee

amount_max.description: Max amount for order by account balance excl. fee

fromAccount.description: Account UID to pay currency from

toAccount.description: Account UID to pay currency from

get.description: Estimate trade fee for currency exchange

parameters.name: fromAccount
parameters.description: Account UID to pay currency from

parameters.name: toAccount
parameters.description: Account UID to pay currency from

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order, array. For example sort[type]=asc&sort[status]=desc

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order, array. For example sort[type]=asc&sort[status]=desc

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order, array. For example sort[type]=asc&sort[status]=desc

items.description: Total balance in main currency, total on hold, total available.

delete.description: Delete account if possible. Balance should be zero

get.summary: Get available deposit methods for user, country and account
get.description: Get available deposit methods for user & country
Get deposit fees | For example currency=USD&amount=100&ps_code=WRT

parameters.name: ps_code
parameters.description: Wire transfer - WRT, Crypto Wallet - CRP, SEPA - SEP, Perfect Money - PMO, QIWI - QWI, OKPay - OKP

post.description: Create transfer between owned accounts or to another CoinsBank customer

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Transfer destination. Could by another customer UID, email address or phone number

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Type of transfer: 1 - to another customer, 0 - to owned account

parameters.name: paymentSystem
parameters.description: Payment system. CRP, PPL, WRT, SEP, PMO, QWI, OKP, WMY

get.summary: Get available withdrawal methods for user & country
get.description: Get available withdrawal methods for user & country

parameters.name: paymentSystem
parameters.description: Wire transfer - WRT, PayPal - PPL, Crypto Wallet - CRP, SEPA - SEP, Perfect Money - PMO, OKPay - OKP

voip.description: Request for call allowed or not

sms.description: Request for SMS allowed or not

min_confirmations.description: Min confirmations count for crypto deposits

params.description: Params for some types of deposits

currencywish.description: Curency to receive to merchant's account

started.description: Date when payment has been started (tx seen in blockchain if cryptocurrency)

finished.description: Date when payment has been received

ttlfixed.description: Time to expire exchange rate and fixed amount for payment in cryptocurrency

total.description: Invoice amount as shown to customer (payee)

currencywish.description: Curency to receive to merchant's account

started.description: Date when payment has been started (tx seen in blockchain if cryptocurrency)

finished.description: Date when payment has been received

ttlfixed.description: Time to expire exchange rate and fixed amount for payment in cryptocurrency

isactive.description: Is operation active (in progess) or not

recoveryValue.description: Email or phone number for recovery

sleepMode.description: Is sleep mode active or not. When sleep mode active, no notifications will come to user's devices

sleepModeFrom.description: Sleep mode time start, format HH:MM

sleepModeTo.description: Sleep mode time end, format HH:MM

url.description: Relative link to view temp file

direction.description: Direction for base pair curency (0 - buy base currency, 1 - sell base currency)

payAll.description: Pay all available amount (0 - don't pay, 1 - pay all)

rateDeviation.description: 1, if deviation from average exchange rate more than 30%, otherwise null

status.description: Order status (0 - initial, 1 - open, 2 - closed, 3 - cancelled, 5 - waiting for Take Profit rate, 6 - waiting for Stop Loss rate)

direction.description: Direction for base pair curency (0 - buy base currency, 1 - sell base currency)

triggered_by.description: Original order UID if current order was triggered by SL/TP

direction.description: Direction for base pair curency (0 - buy base currency, 1 - sell base currency)

triggered_by.description: Original order UID if current order was triggered by SL/TP

total_pay_open.description: Total amount to pay on order creation

total_pay_close.description: Total amount to pay on order close

total_get_open.description: Total amount to get on order creation

total_get_close.description: Total amount to get on order close

get_close.description: Total amount got on order close

pay_close.description: Total amount paid on order close

direction.description: Direction for base pair curency (0 - buy base currency, 1 - sell base currency)

payAll.description: Pay all available amount (0 - don't pay, 1 - pay all)

type.description: Treansfers type number (0 - My account, 1 - Another User)

to.description: User's destination account name (type 0 or another user unique ID (type 1)

status.description: Current status number (0 - Pending, 1 - Rejected, 2 - Confirmed, 3 - Cancelled, 4 - Completed, 5 - Failed, 6 - On Hold, 7 - New, 8 - Awaiting confirmation, 9 - Awaiting approval, 10 - Approved)
Current status number (0=Pending, 1=Rejected, 2=Confirmed, 3=Cancelled, 4=Completed, 5=Failed, 6=On Hold, 7=New, 8=Awaiting confirmation, 9=Awaiting approval, 10=Approved)
